about_the_game:
Cumrooms is a sexy 3D exploration game about nocliping into rooms full of hot monster girls and trying to survive. Get better at delving deeper into the Cumrooms, upgrade your equipment, and find hot new outfits for your girls to wear. If you play your cards right, you might even get a special reward.

Explore The Endless Cumrooms

Carefully navigate the unending subliminal levels, inspired by the well known backrooms. These procedurally generated maps, contain a lot of perils and threats, but also plenty of loot. Explore all of the corridors and experience the strangeness of it all.

Work in an Office with Sexy Girls

Work as a field agent in a cozy corporate office with many hot girls. Immerse yourself in the interactive environment, complete tasks for your new coworkers, engage with the romance system, and enjoy the sexy benefits.

Encounter Hot Monster Girls

When exploring the Cumrooms you will find horny Monster Girls hunting you down. Depending on how horny they are, you may experience the night of your wet dreams! Every Monster Girl has her own special and unique behaviour, so every experience will be different.

Customize Without Limits

Become a part time fashion designer with the modular character customization, which allows you to fully customize any of the Monster Girls to your will. Explore the many items with varieing rarities, which can be found while venturing through the many Cumrooms levels.

Interactive Scenes

Sit back and enjoy the arousing sex scenes, or customize the many aspects of each individual scene to your liking. Control the speed of the hot action, use Freecam to find the perfect position, and enjoy the many fuckable characters.

Other Features

  • Customizable Difficulty

  • Modular Character Customization

  • Procedurally Generated Levels

  • Full Main Story

  • Procedural Story Arcs

  • Big Variety of Items to Equip

  • Romance System

  • Horniness System

  • Fully Interactive Office

  • ...and more

If you like sexy monster girls and having steamy hot sex in subliminal places, you will definitely like it here!

content_descriptors.notes:
This game contains depictions of consensual as well as some slight non-consensual female-on-male sexual content. This content can be turned off with alternative content being available.

Depending on the active Level, themes such as prostitution, drug use, and BDSM may be present.

All characters depicted are over the age of 18.
